lines.text: Ooo, those goody-goody Smurfs make me sick!
Is it much further Papa Smurf?
Not much further my little smurfs.

[different location]
Is it much further Papa Smurf?
Not much Further my little smurfs

[third location]
Is it much further papa smurf?
Everyone what are the first two rules of Smurfdom? #1

[in unison]
No casting spells on your own.

[in Unison]
Don't go into Pappa Smurf's lab without permission.
Nature Smurf, this time your love of animals has gone too far.
I can't help it, Papa Smurf. Azrael got his foot caught in one of Gargamel's traps. I couldn't just leave him there to die.
Okay, but as soon as his foot is better, then back he goes. Understand?
